price: Saa Qur’aan yi nyε (Nwoma) a Onyankopͻn akyi (obi bɛtumi) abͻ (ne) tirimu ayε bie, na mmom (εyε Nyankopͻn Nwoma a) εfoa (Tora ne Injeel) a edi n’anim kan (baeε) no so, ne Nwoma no nkyerεkyerεmu; akyinnyeε biara nni mu, ɛfiri Abͻdeε nyinaa Wura Nyankopͻn no hͻ.
arabic: وَمَا كَانَ هَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانُ أَن يُفۡتَرَىٰ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَلَٰكِن تَصۡدِيقَ ٱلَّذِي بَيۡنَ يَدَيۡهِ وَتَفۡصِيلَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ لَا رَيۡبَ فِيهِ مِن رَّبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wamā kāna hādhā al-qur'ānu an yuf'tarā min dūni al-lahi walākin taṣdīqa alladhī bayna yadayhi watafṣīla al-kitābi lā rayba fīhi min rabbi al-ʿālamīna
